channel.title: Maplestory hackers
channel.description: Does anyone know a good website, that does not scam, where i can get a free MapleGlobal trainer or hacks? Dont tell me to search in google..... I tried and i still cant find any.......

item.title: Maplestory hackers
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Lol OMG I don’t beleive this. I never thought I’d come back up to another MapleStory Hacking thread after I left that all behind.

This is funny… really funny…
MPC sucks big time, there is so much spam and stuff on that website its not even funny. And its not always safe.

I never used MPC I belonged to a couple underground sites. And if you don’t know how to hack they don’t welcome leechers. So you might as well stick to MPC and leeeech as much as you can because you won’t find many good hacks.

Here is an example.
Not to long ago there was a crack where you can get accounts pins. Lol :PPP

I got 3 of my old maple story accounts back using that thing. It was patched like the next day, but yeah I still go ahold of the hack >.<

Main reason I quit MS was because they patched VAC that was soo stupid. I hated that though you can still vac on flying and swimming monsters but man it stunk bad. I mean for the first month or two, people figured out how to vac and still not get d/ced. But that didn’t last to long. Eventually you got d/ced and they have this one website its called MapleStory Noobs there like a buch of NOOBS, thus the name, that report every hacker to that website and they have a big archive of names lol its pretty funny.

Read full topic

item.title: Maplestory hackers
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:9, topic:70698”][quote author=FastBallz link=topic=103883.msg1088982#msg1088982 date=1175670107]
Are you kidding me?

People like you guys should die …

If your that bad at leeching you should really give up…
[/quote]

There used to be a program called Xenos, that could hack into MapleStory and change your items. But then WIZET patched the game, so Xenos got smarter and made a new program called cheaterengine. It works but you need cheat tables.[/quote]

LMAOFSODMAOMO!@#!!!

LOL…

K

1st. His name isnt “Xenos” its… Dark Byte… He never made a program that could change items…

2nd. Cheat Engine is patched

3rd. Wizet didn’t patch the game.

4th GameGuard patched it…

Please. Stfu

Read full topic
